page.title: 05A BOARDING SCHOOL.12 JUNE.
page.content:
7.30:I got up washed and dressed.
7.55:We went in for breakfast,which lasted 20 minutes. 9.00:Assembly. 9.25:Science;nearly our last lesson on micro-electronics. 11.00:Maths;working on Domesday Project.(Continued this in Geography). 12.15: P.E.;800 metre run followed by an 11 length swim. 1.00:Lunch;sausages & waffles followed by chocolate sponge. 2.20:English:writing our novels. 3.45:Art;designing L.P. covers & then t-shirts. 5.00:Tea;beefburgers & scones. 6.00:Prep. 7.50:Watched T.V.& then played snooker. 9.00:Went up to bed. 9.30:Lights out.
